title: Jake Tapper talks McCarthyism, Trump, and the Media
description: Jake Tapper, host of CNN's "State of the Union" and "The Lead with Jake Tapper" joins Chuck to talk about his new thriller "The Hellfire Club" - a novel about Washington during the era of McCarthy, and why history might be repeating itself.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
